post_content:
All sold.

Sheckard is mislabeled by PSA, and Westlake has traces of name at the top.

Shipping is included, let me know if you have any questions.

To get a higher resolution image (from the Edge browser), right click on the image and hit "Open image in new tab." That'll take you to the hosted image, and you can either magnify or download.

First up, the 2s and 2.5s...

Wid Conroy fielding Piedmont 150 PSA 2 - pulled
Ed Karger Sweet Caporal 150/30 PSA 2 - pulled
Joe Kelley (HOF) Polar Bear PSA 2.5 - pulled
Joe Lake with ball Polar Bear PSA 2 - pulled
Billy Maloney Piedmont 350 PSA 2.5 -sold
Tom Needham Sweet Caporal 350-460/42op PSA 2 - sold
George Schirm Piedmont 350 PSA 2 - sold
Jimmy Sheckard no glove Sweet Caporal 350/30 PSA 2.5 - sold
James Westlake (SL) Piedmont 350 PSA 2(MC) - pulled

All sold.

And the 1s and 1.5s...

I'll take the Chase. PM coming.

Bump. 

Almost forgot I still had one still available.
